ModMetaData.name: Biomes! Islands
ModMetaData.author: The Biomes Mod Team
ModMetaData.description:
The islands module for the Biomes! mods. Requires Biomes! Core loaded before in order to work.
[SwimmingKit](https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1542399915) is included by default. This is added in a way that's compatible to having the mod present or not, either way your pawns and animals will be able to swim now in custom biomes!
